name: POLYSYN BF 5035
description: Polysyn BF 5035 is an unsaturated polyester resin specifically formulated for the manufacture of benzoyl peroxide cured body filler (body stopper) compounds for use in automotive refinish industry. Supplied at 68±2% solid content and a viscosity of 4-8 poises. Has excellent flexibility, easy to sand and file. It’s best for automotive refinish body filler and for smooth texture putty. It is a polyester resin characterized by Excellent cross-linking, therefore easy sanding properties with no tack.
